snippet: A growing number of cities and towns are choosing to stop adding fluoride to their water, driven by tight budgets and inconclusive findings on its benefits.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of cities and towns are choosing to stop adding fluoride to their water, driven by tight budgets and inconclusive findings on its benefits.

headline.main: Looking to Save Money, More Places Decide to Stop Fluoridating the Water
headline.print_headline: Looking to Save Money, More Places Decide to Stop Fluoridating the Water
